mapper.select: select permissionid id , permname name , parentid pid from sys_permission order by sortnum

select permissionid , permname, permcode, permdescribe, parentid, url, permtype, (select permname from sys_permission t where t.permissionid=a.parentid) parentpermname, enabled, sortnum, updatetime, iconcss, enabled, isblanktarget from sys_permission a where permissionid=#{permissionid}
select permcode from sys_permission a where permcode=#{permcode} and a.permissionid<>#{permissionid}
select permcode from sys_permission a where url=#{url} and url!='#' and a.permissionid<>#{permissionid}
select permcode from sys_permission a where parentid=#{parentid}
mapper.delete: delete s.* from sys_permission s where s.permissionid=#{permissionid} and s.deleteable='1'

delete t.* from sys_permission t where deleteable='1' and permissionid in
#{id}
